item.description: One of several nifty additions to Chrome DevTools: ‚ÄúAs an author, you want to see and debug the code that you wrote, not the Deployed Code. To make up for it, you can now have the tree show the Authored Code instead.‚Äù https://t.co/idhMw3XOUe
item.source:markdown: One of several nifty additions to Chrome DevTools: ‚ÄúAs an author, you want to see and debug the code that you wrote, not the Deployed Code. To make up for it, you can now have the tree show the Authored Code instead.‚Äù https://t.co/idhMw3XOUe
